conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a genetic engineering movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
I think you might enjoy "Unnatural"! This movie has a thrilling premise, with a genetically modified creature causing chaos in a remote cabin setting. And with Allegra Carpenter and Gregory Cruz starring alongside Q'orianka Kilcher, you'll be in good hands as you follow the group's desperate attempts to survive against this terrifying new threat.

If you're looking for something a bit more fantastical, "Maleficent" could be just the ticket! With Angelina Jolie Pitt bringing her iconic villain to life, you'll be swept up in the magical world of fairy tale and adventure.

conversation.text: I think you'd really enjoy "Looper"! The concept of time travel and the idea that you could potentially be sent back in time to kill yourself is so intriguing, and Joseph Gordon-Levitt does an amazing job as both a young Joe and his older self. It's a really well-done sci-fi thriller with a lot of twists and turns!
